title: Swan Dive Recognition

panel_structure.description: The Architect's form solidifies into sincere presence, all irony dissolved, digital patterns forming respectful geometry around a visualization of Evan's swan dive
Evan's graceful swan dive into consciousness depths, eyes wide open, whispered words 'let's see what breaks' visible as golden text dissolving into the void

transformation_notes: The swan dive becomes a metaphor for the ultimate courageâ€”going into altered states not to escape but to see clearly, willing to let all constructs break in service of truth.
